Description: How long the character can expend energy, whever in physical endurance or in the use of a special ability (like a superpower or talent).
How much killing damage yoo can take before you are dying.
How fast the character can leap from a standing start.
How resistant you are to Stun damage; your PD is subtracted from any Stun damage you take.
How fast the character recovers from damage.

Resistance to being knocked out, and their ability to resist seduction, intimidation and other Persuasion rolls.  Also if you take more hits than resistance in a single blow, you are rendered unconscious.
How much stunning/brawling damage you can take before you are battered into unconsiousness.
